translation: 尸检报告：凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟

original: “Died at 2:01PM. Body shows no signs of cuts or bruising. The Alchemist Report has verified that death was not caused by poison or disease. \n \nBody shows traces of necromancy and illusion magic. Cause of death is not apparent but very likely caused by necromancy magic.”
translation: “死亡时间下午2:01。尸体上没有割伤或瘀伤。炼金化验报告也证明死因不是中毒或疾病。\n\n尸体上有死灵术和幻觉魔法的痕迹。死因尚不明确，但极有可能是死灵术所致。”
